item.body: People often take casual jobs in catering for [[want]] of any alternative.
item.b: (食物,金钱,衣服等的)匮乏;贫困
item.d: 要求(某人)到来;要求与(某人)谈话;要(某人)到某地

item.a: 令人愉悦的，惬意的；使人满足的

item.body: She looked [[green]] this morning and was sent to hospital.
item.b: 绿色的，（水果）青绿色的，尚不成熟的

item.body: He was [[mean]] to those who worked for him but generous to those who he hardly knew.
The experience of rape can change how a woman [[feels]] about her body.
There is a sharp [[fall]] in the birth rate in European countries.
If you want to use cheese instead of chicken, that's [[fine]] .
The paper splashed the [[story]] on page one.
Will you like a little more [[fish]]?
He scarecely to earns enough to [[keep]] himself and his family.
item.b: 使［某人或某物］保持［某种状态］

item.sentence: He's so [[mean]], he won't even buy his wife a birthday present.
The [[mean]] length of stay in the hospital is 11 days.
Finding a lump does not necessarily [[mean]] you have cancer.
item.definition: to be a sign that something is true or will happen

item.sentence: Sharon and the others were really [[mean]] to me at school today.
The [[mean]] of 7, 9, and 14 is found by adding them together and dividing by 3.
item.definition: the average amount, figure, or value

item.sentence: We must find a [[mean]] between hope and despair.
item.definition: a method of doing something which is between two very different methods, and better than either of them

item.sentence: It [[felt]] great to be up in the mountains.
item.definition: to give you a particular physical feeling, especially when you touch or hold something

item.sentence: There was nothing Lucy liked more than the [[feel]] of fur against her skin.
item.definition: the way that something feels when you touch it

item.sentence: When his dad left, he [[felt]] as though his world had turned upside-down.
item.definition: to experience a particular physical feeling or emotion

item.sentence: The earthquake was [[felt]] as far south as San Diego.
item.definition: to notice something that is happening to you, especially something that is touching you

item.sentence: She [[felt]] sure she'd made the right decision.
item.definition: to have a particular opinion, especially one that is based on your feelings, not on facts

item.sentence: The seats look good and have a sturdy [[feel]].
item.definition: a quality that something has that makes you feel or think a particular way about it
